title: ðŸš¨Vikings to hire Kevin O'Connell from the Rams following Super Bowl 56 - Emergency Podcast (Football 2/2)
description:
Over half the head coaching vacancies in the NFL have now been filled as the Vikings chose their guy to replace Mike Zimmer. Following Super Bowl 56, Minnesota will be able to officially announce the hiring of Rams OC Kevin O'Connell. Will Brinson is joined by Eric DeBerardinis to break down the news and why the Vikings didn't go with Jim Harbaugh. What does the future look like for Kirk Cousins under O'Connell and will the move impact L.A. at all in the Super Bowl?

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
